code:
(define/contract (minimum-changes s k)
  (-> string? exact-integer? exact-integer?)
  
  (define (calc-changes str)
    (let loop ((i 0) (j (- (string-length str) 1)) (changes 0))
      (if (>= i j)
          changes
          (loop (+ i 1) (- j 1) (if (char=? (string-ref str i) (string-ref str j)) changes (+ changes 1))))))

  (define memo (make-hash))

  (define (dp start seg)
    (if (= seg 1)
        (calc-changes (substring s start))
        (if (hash-has-key? memo (cons start seg))
            (hash-ref memo (cons start seg))
            (let loop ((i (+ start 1)) (min +inf.0))
              (if (> i (string-length s)) min
                  (let ((changes (+ (calc-changes (substring s start i)) (dp i (- seg 1)))))
                    (if (< changes min)
                        (begin
                          (hash-set! memo (cons start seg) changes)
                          (loop (+ i 1) changes))
                        (loop (+ i 1) min))))))))

  (if (= k 1)
      (calc-changes s)
      (dp 0 k)))
